Two-Way Sync

Your books, always in sync

Stop wasting hours on double entry. Thorbis syncs bidirectionally with QuickBooks in real-time, keeping your financials accurate without the manual work.

Everything syncs automatically

Comprehensive two-way sync keeps your financial data perfectly aligned

T
Thorbis → QuickBooks
Data flowing to your books
Invoices & Estimates
  • • Customer invoices with line items
  • • Sales receipts and quotes
  • • Service items and descriptions
  • • Tax calculations and rates
Payments & Deposits
  • • Credit card payments
  • • ACH/bank transfers
  • • Cash and check payments
  • • Payment applications to invoices
Expenses & Bills
  • • Parts and materials costs
  • • Vendor bills and purchases
  • • Job costing data
  • • Expense categories
Customers & Jobs
  • • Customer profiles and contacts
  • • Job/project details
  • • Service addresses
  • • Customer notes and tags
QB
QuickBooks → Thorbis
Data flowing to the field
Chart of Accounts
  • • Income accounts
  • • Expense categories
  • • Asset accounts
  • • Account mappings
Products & Services
  • • Service items and pricing
  • • Inventory items
  • • Product descriptions
  • • Price levels and discounts
Customer Updates
  • • Customer information changes
  • • Payment terms
  • • Credit limits
  • • Billing preferences
Financial Data
  • • Account balances
  • • Outstanding invoices
  • • Payment history
  • • Tax settings

Integration that just works

Built by accountants and field service experts who understand both worlds

Real-Time Sync
Changes sync instantly, not on a schedule
  • Instant data updates
  • No batch processing delays
  • Always up-to-date financials
  • Live sync status monitoring
True Bidirectional
Data flows both ways, keeping everything in sync
  • Updates from either system
  • Automatic conflict resolution
  • Master record management
  • Change tracking & audit logs
5-Minute Setup
Connect in minutes, not hours or days
  • OAuth secure connection
  • Automatic field mapping
  • Smart default settings
  • Guided configuration wizard
Bank-Level Security
Your financial data is protected at every step
  • 256-bit encryption
  • SOC 2 Type II certified
  • No data stored in transit
  • Audit trail for all changes
Smart Field Mapping
Intelligent matching of data fields and accounts
  • Automatic account matching
  • Custom field mapping
  • Class and location tracking
  • Tax code synchronization
Error Prevention
Catch issues before they become problems
  • Validation before sync
  • Duplicate detection
  • Balance reconciliation
  • Automated error notifications
